pinnedRepos.name: rag-chatbot
pinnedRepos.description: Flask chatbot for querying uploaded PDFs via retrieval-augmented generation. Runs any GGUF model locally with llama.cppâ€”no external tools like Ollama or LM Studio required. Supports multi-model responses and session history.

pinnedRepos.name: Cosmic-Observer
pinnedRepos.description: Interactive Flask app for exploring space weather, aurora visibility, and exoplanets using real-time data from NASA and NOAA. Built with Plotly, Pandas, and Geopy.

pinnedRepos.name: BrainTumorClassificationModelComparison
pinnedRepos.description: This Repo Compares Performance of three different Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) models trained for brain tumor classification into four categories: glioma, meningioma, notumor, and pituitary.

pinnedRepos.name: scoreFi-2.0
pinnedRepos.description: a risk scoring system for DeFi wallets interacting with the Compound V2 and V3 protocols. It is an extension of my existing Risk Scoring system: ScoreFi. The current system analyzes live on-chain transaction patterns, behavioral indicators, and risk management practices to assign risk scores between 0-1000, where higher scores indicate higher risk

otherRepos.name: hmblecreator.github.io

otherRepos.name: SaaSquatch-Intelligence-Hub
otherRepos.description: AI-powered lead scoring & prioritization tool for SaaSquatch Leads. Analyzes leads across 5 dimensions, automatically tiers A/B/C/D, and provides actionable buying signals. Built with React + Tailwind CSS.

otherRepos.name: MathematicalUniverseExplorer
otherRepos.description: Visualize 3D mathematical functions with an interactive Tkinter GUI. Powered by Matplotlib and NumPy for real-time surface rendering and custom expressions. An extended version of Desmos

otherRepos.name: Game
otherRepos.description: Fruit Frenzy was my first fun projectâ€”a quirky Tkinter-based guessing game where players chase points by randomly drawing fruits or veggies. It includes score tracking, turn-based logic, and a personalized greeting system. A lighthearted way to explore GUIs, randomness, and interactive design in Python.

otherRepos.name: Luxury_Products_Apparel_Recommendation_Engine
otherRepos.description: A content-based fashion recommender system built in Python and Jupyter Notebook. It analyzes user-preferred item features to suggest similar luxury apparel products from a curated dataset. Highlights include data preprocessing, feature extraction, and cosine similarity for personalized results.

otherRepos.name: Text-Statistics-Counter
otherRepos.description: Text Statistics Counter is a Python app built with PyQt6 for real-time document analysis. It tracks word and character count, estimates pages based on user-defined settings, and offers text export. Lightweight and intuitive, it's perfect for writers and editors needing fast, customizable feedback.

otherRepos.name: ICA
otherRepos.description: Intelligent Code Assistant (ICA)  A multi-language code summarizer built with Python and CustomTkinter. It analyzes class structures, functions, and imports across various languages, and generates clear natural language summaries through a clean, syntax-highlighted GUI.  Ideal for devs

otherRepos.name: OS_Project
otherRepos.description: Python-powered system utility with a sleek CustomTkinter interface. Monitor processes, analyze performance, optimize resources, and get detailed system infoâ€”all in one place. Ideal for OS enthusiasts and productivity tweakers.

otherRepos.name: QuantumWaveFunctionSimulator

otherRepos.name: scoreFi
otherRepos.description: Machine learning pipeline to score DeFi wallets (0â€“1000) based on Aave V2 interactions. Includes feature engineering, Sybil detection, and behavioral analysis to support trust-driven lending and wallet segmentation.

otherRepos.name: space-debris-tracker
otherRepos.description: Tracks orbital debris using satellite data and ML models to analyze space object motion and collision risks. Built with Python backend and interactive frontend.

otherRepos.name: Lunar-Surface-Feature-Classification-
otherRepos.description: This project presents a comprehensive image classification pipeline designed to  analyze and classify images from the Artificial Lunar Rocky Landscape Dataset. The  goal is to improve accuracy and generalization using state-of-the-art deep learning  architectures, data augmentation techniques, and robust evaluation strategies.

otherRepos.name: Open-Source-Licence-Wizard
otherRepos.description: A Streamlit app that helps you choose the best open-source license for your project based on your preferences. Provides recommendations with key features.

otherRepos.name: DevFlow-Reflector
otherRepos.description: DevFlow Reflector is a developer productivity tool that visualizes your Git history and lets you track your coding journey through integrated journaling. It transforms raw commit logs into dynamic analytics and insightsâ€”helping you understand your work patterns and improve your workflow. Designed as a minimal MVP with future plans for Extensions.
